TopicTitle: Warp To Next Maneuver Node Button

Articles.Content:
Warping to the next maneuver node is really useful.  Why do we need to try and right click the orbit line to do so.

Sometimes I cannot click the orbit line because I have just separated two vessels and the orbit lines now cover one another.

 

Solution

Nestle a button with the Time Warp drop down bar that will allow for easy access.  Similar to the warp to next morning.

 

Edited April 30, 2016 by MoeslyArmlis
